verses.verse: He that dasheth in pieces <S%H6327><s%> <S%H8688><s%> is come up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8804><s%> before thy face <S%H6440><s%>: keep <S%H5341><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the munition <S%H4694><s%>, watch <S%H6822><s%> <S%H8761><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%>, make thy loins <S%H4975><s%> strong <S%H2388><s%> <S%H8761><s%>, fortify <S%H553><s%> <S%H8761><s%> thy power <S%H3581><s%> mightily <S%H3966><s%>.

For the YY <S%H3068><s%> hath turned away <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the excellency <S%H1347><s%> of Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>, as the excellency <S%H1347><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>: for the emptiers <S%H1238><s%> <S%H8802><s%> have emptied them out <S%H1238><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and marred <S%H7843><s%> <S%H8765><s%> their vine branches <S%H2156><s%>.

The shield <S%H4043><s%> of his mighty men <S%H1368><s%> is made red <S%H119><s%> <S%H8794><s%>, the valiant <S%H2428><s%> men <S%H582><s%> are in scarlet <S%H8529><s%> <S%H8794><s%>: the chariots <S%H7393><s%> shall be with flaming <S%H784><s%> torches <S%H6393><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of his preparation <S%H3559><s%> <S%H8687><s%>, and the fir trees <S%H1265><s%> shall be terribly shaken <S%H7477><s%> <S%H8717><s%>.

The chariots <S%H7393><s%> shall rage <S%H1984><s%> <S%H8704><s%> in the streets <S%H2351><s%>, they shall justle one against another <S%H8264><s%> <S%H8698><s%> in the broad ways <S%H7339><s%>: they shall seem <S%H4758><s%> like torches <S%H3940><s%>, they shall run <S%H7323><s%> <S%H8787><s%> like the lightnings <S%H1300><s%>.

He shall recount <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his worthies <S%H117><s%>: they shall stumble <S%H3782><s%> <S%H8735><s%> in their walk <S%H1979><s%>; they shall make haste <S%H4116><s%> <S%H8762><s%> to the wall <S%H2346><s%> thereof, and the defence <S%H5526><s%> <S%H8802><s%> shall be prepared <S%H3559><s%> <S%H8717><s%>.
The gates <S%H8179><s%> of the rivers <S%H5104><s%> shall be opened <S%H6605><s%> <S%H8738><s%>, and the palace <S%H1964><s%> shall be dissolved <S%H4127><s%> <S%H8738><s%>.

And Huzzab <S%H5324><s%> <S%H8717><s%> shall be led away captive <S%H1540><s%> <S%H8795><s%>, she shall be brought up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8717><s%>, and her maids <S%H519><s%> shall lead <S%H5090><s%> <S%H8764><s%> her as with the voice <S%H6963><s%> of doves <S%H3123><s%>, tabering <S%H8608><s%> <S%H8781><s%> upon their breasts <S%H3824><s%>.

But Ninveh <S%H5210><s%> is of old <S%H3117><s%> like a pool <S%H1295><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%>: yet they shall flee away <S%H5127><s%> <S%H8801><s%>. Stand <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, stand <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, shall they cry; but none shall look back <S%H6437><s%> <S%H8688><s%>.

Take ye the spoil <S%H962><s%> <S%H8798><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%>, take the spoil <S%H962><s%> <S%H8798><s%> of gold <S%H2091><s%>: for there is none end <S%H7097><s%> of the store <S%H8498><s%> and glory <S%H3519><s%> out of all the pleasant <S%H2532><s%> furniture <S%H3627><s%>.

She is empty <S%H950><s%>, and void <S%H4003><s%>, and waste <S%H1110><s%> <S%H8794><s%>: and the heart <S%H3820><s%> melteth <S%H4549><s%> <S%H8738><s%>, and the knees <S%H1290><s%> smite together <S%H6375><s%>, and much pain <S%H2479><s%> is in all loins <S%H4975><s%>, and the faces <S%H6440><s%> of them all gather <S%H6908><s%> <S%H8765><s%> blackness <S%H6289><s%>.

Where is the dwelling <S%H4583><s%> of the lions <S%H738><s%>, and the feedingplace <S%H4829><s%> of the young lions <S%H3715><s%>, where the lion <S%H738><s%>, even the old lion <S%H3833><s%>, walked <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and the lion's <S%H738><s%> whelp <S%H1482><s%>, and none made them afraid <S%H2729><s%> <S%H8688><s%> ?

The lion <S%H738><s%> did tear in pieces <S%H2963><s%> <S%H8802><s%> enough <S%H1767><s%> for his whelps <S%H1484><s%>, and strangled <S%H2614><s%> <S%H8764><s%> for his lionesses <S%H3833><s%>, and filled <S%H4390><s%> <S%H8762><s%> his holes <S%H2356><s%> with prey <S%H2964><s%>, and his dens <S%H4585><s%> with ravin <S%H2966><s%>.

Behold, I am against thee, saith <S%H5002><s%> <S%H8803><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> TZva'ot <S%H6635><s%>, and I will burn <S%H1197><s%> <S%H8689><s%> her chariots <S%H7393><s%> in the smoke <S%H6227><s%>, and the sword <S%H2719><s%> shall devour <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thy young lions <S%H3715><s%>: and I will cut off <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8689><s%> thy prey <S%H2964><s%> from the earth <S%H776><s%>, and the voice <S%H6963><s%> of thy messengers <S%H4397><s%> shall no more be heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8735><s%>.
